meanings.sent2: He quietly beholds the stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The cat beholds the curious mouse with interest.
meanings.sent4: The artist beholds the blank canvas, ready to create.
meanings.sent5: The child beholds the magic of a rainbow after the rain.

meanings.definition: To look at or gaze upon
meanings.sent1: The tourist beholds the majestic mountains in awe.
meanings.sent2: We often behold the beauty of nature around us.
meanings.sent3: The puppy beholds its reflection in the mirror, confused.
meanings.sent4: The old tree beholds the passing of time in its rings.
meanings.sent5: The audience beholds the breathtaking performance on stage.
